ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and at the mountains - how they were embedded?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And the mountains, how they were fixed;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And the mountains: how they were fixed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: how the mountains are set firm,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the mountains – how they have been established?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And at the mountains, how they are rooted
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the mountains, how they are firmly fixed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the hills, how they are set up?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and on the mountains, how they are firmly set up,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And at the mountains, how they are rooted?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and the mountains, how they have been set?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And at the Mountains, how they are fixed firm?-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And at the mountains, how they are rooted and fixed firm?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and how the mountains were firmly fixed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And at the mountains—how they are installed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And at the mountains - how they are erected?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [88:19] And the mountains, how they were set?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the hills, how they are set up) on earth, unmoved?
